metadata.name: INCOGNITO TWITTER ARTIST
metadata.description:
As I scroll through my feed, I see
The works of artists, both bold and meek
Each piece a masterpiece, unique and rare
Yet often, the artist is nowhere to be found, I swear

Their work speaks volumes, but they stay hidden
Behind their screens, they remain unbidden
Afraid, perhaps, to step into the limelight
To let their art shine, and take flight

But oh, if only they knew
The beauty and power they imbue
Their art with, if only they'd show
Their faces, their souls, let their true selves glow

For when we see the artist behind the art
It adds depth and meaning, a special part
Of the creation we've come to admire
Their vulnerability, their passion, their fire

So to all you artists out there, young and old
Don't be afraid to let your story be told
To show the world the person behind the brush
And in doing so, make your art that much more lush.
